input_text:
Job Title: Civil Designer – Become an Expert in Land Development

Location: Houston, TX

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
We are seeking a passionate and experienced Civil Designer to join our client’s team. Imagine being part of a small company with a family feel, where you can develop your skills and become a subject matter expert in Land Development. Working onsite will not only boost team collaboration but also provide you with the opportunity to grow in a supportive environment.

Benefits

– Opportunity to specialize and excel in Land Development

– Small team environment fostering close-knit relationships

– Chance to work on diverse projects ranging from municipal programs to housing and commercial developments

Responsibilities

– Contribute to engineering designs for various projects including plans, profiles, and utility details

– Gain expertise in civil engineering disciplines such as grading, drainage, and stormwater management

– Ensure accuracy and completeness in design plans and calculations to guarantee project success

Requirements

– Hold an Associates or Bachelor’s degree in a related field or possess equivalent work-related experience

– Proficient in Civil 3D with a strong background in Land Development

– Skilled in using basic production software tools (Word, Excel, PowerPoint)

Do you have any disability or condition that could affect you in the application and interview process? Please feel free to share this information as part of your application, including any necessary adjustments you might need, so we can help make the process easier for you. We assure you this information will not have any negative effect on the interview process outcome.

About NonStop: We are NonStop, a leading provider of staffing solutions throughout Europe and now also in the US. We’re passionate about connecting talent with opportunity and work non-stop to support our clients in hiring the best talent for their teams. Feel free to pop over to our website, NonStop Consulting (https://www.nonstopconsulting.com), for more information, to browse all our roles, or to let us know how we can help you.

Experience Level (if available): Entry level
